txt.en: Ayaluk  asked you to meet him near the entry of the overseer's office.
'Yes, citizen? What can do for you?'
After assisting Ayaluk he returned to his family home with haste. He directed you to speak with him there.
You need to distract the guard long enough to allow time to search the overseer's office.
'I only need a couple of minutes. Go distract the guard.'
'I only need you to distract the guards for a few short moments while I search the office.'
You distracted the guard long enough to keep them from catching him.
You successfully distracted the guard
Speak to Ayaluk near Overseer Ulanor's Office
Keep the guard distracted for at least two minutes
'What I found is worse than I feared. I need some time to review this information. Meet me at my family home. I must go.'
Ayaluk left the overseer's office and ran back toward his home
Speak with Ayaluk and complete 'Instance: Whispers of the Forge'
Ayaluk asked you to distract the guards who watch over the overseer's office in the fortress. He is certain that there is something untoward happening here.
'Are you alright citizen? Do you need assistance? Are you choking?'
'We will wait for Ulanor to be on the long part of her walk. You distract the guard and I will slip in and out of her chambers to get the proof we need.'

'Friend, I have had a change of heart. The overseer here in Rakhat√¢b brings too much harm. My brother should not have been killed. I have watched the comings and goings of individuals with whom the overseer meets, and I believe that there is some rot here that must be cut out. I intend to slip into her chambers, get whatever information I can, and report it to certain folk who can do something about it.\n\n'I only require a distraction long enough to cover my efforts. Will you help me?'
'Good day to you too, citizen.'
'These notes are clear. The overseer is hiding something and we need the help of others if we are to expose it!'
Whispers of the Forge
